body: I'm just glad she snapped out of it and realized her mistake instead of cheating on him, like a lot of stories would progress. Plot is surprisingly fleshed out for such a short and simple ero Manga.

The people that don't realize she's mostly to blame for his passivity are pretty lacking in reading comprehension. 
At first, like everyone else, I was like "this guy is a douche", but halfway in it became perfectly clear that she was a dead lay and hadn't put anything into the sex until then. I can see why dude ran to a game character that embodies service, it is tiring being the only one that puts out, and the story even acknowledges it; the girl says how she's never given head or been on top despite bf pulling all stops to finger and lick her brains off before, and she asks for forgiveness for being a dead lay.
to the people blaming the bf, she also wasn't giving anything to the relationship before the cosplay thing. not even tits like those can save a relationship where neither contributes.
fucker doesn't deserve her
